Move from GraphBuilder and ObjSettings -> GraphBuilder + Introspection + Visualization (#49)

* Added simple Visualization interface

* Added base Introspection interface

* Added base partial Introspection implementation, which is common both for Reflection API and JOL

* Implemented Introspection implementation using Reflection API

* Added getObjFieldsNum for Introspection

* Added object fields fetching methods to Introspection: getObjFields, countObjectPrimitiveFields

* Switched GraphBuilder to use IntrospectionWithReflectionAPI class instead of internal logic and ObjSettings. Removed ObjSettings

* Implemented common visualization

* Moved Introspection objectFieldIsPrimitive check to public visibility

* Added visualization check if object was already drawn && fixed small issues

* Added alternative GraphBuilder implementation and switched LJV to use it

* Removed unused GraphBuilder code and fully switched to new implementation

* refactoring, NodeTypeProvider

Co-authored-by: Ivan Ponomarev <iponomarev@mail.ru>
